price: 199. Oo uu ku dul akhriyi lahaa, ma ay rumeeyeen waxa ku soo arooray14.
arabic: فَقَرَأَهُۥ عَلَيۡهِم مَّا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ مُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: faqara-ahu ʿalayhim mā kānū bihi mu'minīna
